text: The Angriest Man in Brooklyn is a 2014 American comedy-drama movie directed by Phil Alden Robinson. It stars Robin Williams, Mila Kunis, Peter Dinklage, Melissa Leo and James Earl Jones. It was released in selected theaters on May 23, 2014. It follows a man who has 90 minutes to live. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2014 movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Lionsgate movies
title: The Angriest Man in Brooklyn
